name: Black Sheep (itch)
description:
Black Sheep

Get free from the small word you've been trapped in your whole life.

This is my entry in the Ludum Dare 38 Compo category. Made using Godot. Both the project code & configuration, and assets are under free licenses. Check out the source code. This is also my first time making a game and using Godot.

Each run of the game is 1 minute.

GPG signatures for the uploads are available. To verify signatures:

  • Download the ".sig" file corresponding with the binary you want to check
  • Run "gpg --verify <sig_file> <binary_file>", replacing "<sig_file>" and "<binary_file>" with the file names and paths on your system.
Here's the entry on LDJAM.com
